select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, h.name hashtag_name, t.category_no, c.name category_name, t.user_no owner_no, u.nickname owner_nickname, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no where public = 1 order by t.theme_no

select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, t.reported_cnt, t.user_no owner_no, u.email owner_email, u.nickname owner_nickname, t.category_no, c.name category_name, h.name hashtag_name, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no=c.category_no left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no=h.theme_no inner join jeju_user u on t.user_no=u.user_no where t.theme_no=#{no}

select t.theme_no, user_no owner_no, title, public, view_cnt, reported_cnt, c.name category_name, h.name hashtag_name, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left outer join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no=h.theme_no join jeju_theme_category c on c.category_no=t.category_no where user_no=#{no}

select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.category_no, c.name, u.user_no owner_no, u.nickname owner_name, u.email owner_email, h.name hashtag_name, t.emoji from jeju_theme t inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no inner join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no left outer join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no where h.name = #{hashtag}

select t.theme_no, user_no owner_no, title, public, view_cnt, reported_cnt, c.name category_name, h.name hashtag_name, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left outer join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no=h.theme_no join jeju_theme_category c on c.category_no=t.category_no where t.title like (concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
select category_no, name from jeju_theme_category where category_no = #{no}

select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, h.name hashtag_name, t.category_no, c.name category_name, t.user_no owner_no, u.nickname owner_nickname, jput.place_id, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no inner join jeju_place_user_theme jput on jput.theme_no = t.theme_no where public = 1 and place_id= #{place_id} order by t.theme_no
mapper.update: update jeju_theme set view_cnt= view_cnt + 1 where theme_no=#{themeNo}
mapper.select: select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, t.reported_cnt, t.user_no owner_no, u.email owner_email, u.nickname owner_nickname, t.category_no, c.name category_name, h.name hashtag_name, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no=c.category_no left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no=h.theme_no inner join jeju_user u on t.user_no=u.user_no order by view_cnt desc

select t.theme_no, t.title, user_no owner_no, t.reported_cnt, h.name hashtag_name, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left outer join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no=h.theme_no where reported_cnt > 0 order by reported_cnt desc
mapper.delete: delete from jeju_liked_theme where theme_no=#{param1} and user_no=#{param2}

select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, h.name hashtag_name, t.category_no, c.name category_name, t.user_no owner_no, u.nickname owner_nickname, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no where t.public = 1 order by t.view_cnt desc limit 10

select t.theme_no, t.title, t.public, t.share, t.view_cnt, h.name hashtag_name, t.category_no, t.created_dt, t.user_no owner_no, u.nickname owner_nickname, t.emoji from jeju_theme t left join jeju_theme_hashtag h on t.theme_no = h.theme_no left join jeju_theme_category c on t.category_no = c.category_no inner join jeju_user u on u.user_no = t.user_no where t.public = 1 group by t.created_dt desc limit 10
